title: Tattered Bee Wing
summaries: The Tattered Bee Wing is a rare Hardmode crafting material dropped by Moss Hornets with a 1*1/100 (1%) / 0.67*1/150 (0.67%) chance. It is used solely to craft Bee Wings.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, at least one <linked>Mechanical Boss</linked> must be defeated before it will drop.

statistics.Sell: 250

ingredients.value:
• [img:Soul of Flight]Soul of Flight (20)
  • [img:Tattered Bee Wing]Tattered Bee Wing
